reviews.review_text: I had a pleasant surprise during my stay at the Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport in Richmond. I had initially avoided it due to its seemingly hidden location in a car dealership parking lot, but I was genuinely impressed. The gym was excellent, my room was impeccably clean, and the staff went above and beyond in providing friendly service. The attached restaurant offered great food and top-notch service, making my stay truly enjoyable. A hidden gem indeed! Food & drinks: Attached restaurant was great.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Steven, Good Day! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at the Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport in Richmond. We truly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear about your pleasant surprise during your stay. We understand that our location within a car dealership parking lot may be unconventional, but were delighted that you found the experience to be a hidden gem. We take pride in offering exceptional amenities and services to our guests. Its fantastic to hear that you enjoyed our excellent gym facilities, impeccably clean rooms, and the friendly service provided by our dedicated staff. Were also pleased that you had a great dining experience at our attached restaurant. We strive to provide top-notch service in every aspect of your stay, and your feedback reaffirms our commitment to delivering a memorable experience to all our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport in Richmond in the future. If theres anything specific youd like during your next stay, please dont hesitate to let us know. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we appreciate your support. Kevin Ortiz Luis Front Office Staff

reviews.review_text: Stayed here a few weeks ago via a last minute reservation when my stay at another nearby hotel went south. This property was just what I needed to help turnaround my day. The staff were friendly, welcomed me with a smile, and even proactively helped me with unloading and storing my bags. Parking a bit odd in terms of layout and design but very manageable once you understand how it works. Staff were quickly responsive to requests I made and food delivery was allowed to deliver the food directly to my room. This hotel is a gem that is of the best Holiday Inns I ve stayed at in a long time. I would be delighted to stay here again next time I m in the area and need a hotel near the airport.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Lucas Matze, Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Holiday Inn VANCOUVER AIRPORT- RICHMOND. Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us. We use feedback, such as yours, to continuously make changes to our brand to improve the guest experience. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future. Again, thank you for choosing Holiday Inn, and if I can be of assistance to you, please contact me directly at 6048211818 or service@hiyvr.com. Sincerely, Kendrick Padua Front Office Manager 6048211818 service@hiyvr.com

reviews.review_text: The staff at this location are so very friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean and modern. The facility offers everything you need if you are overnighting to/from a flight or a cruise. It is also a good location to access the city for longer stays. I use the hotel regularly and have yet to have a bad experience. I would recommend it. The only  negative  and it is not the hotel, is the attached restaurants breakfast is quite expensive and the quality is not the best and the service can be slow at times. But that s not the hotel!

My family and I had a great experience here! From the booking phone call to the check out everything was organized and easy. The rooms were modern and ergonomic. Classy and convenient. The staff was thoughtful and kind. I highly recommend this hotel. Rooms: Rooms are modern and spacious. Food & drinks: Restaurant on site is a great value. Noteworthy details: Staff is amazing and take care of tiny details to make our stay comfortable.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Harry! Your feedback truly brightened our day! Were absolutely thrilled that you and your family had such an enjoyable time with us. Your appreciation for our modern and ergonomic rooms, smooth booking process, and our teams thoughtful service means the world to us. We cant thank you enough for the recommendation, and were already looking forward to the pleasure of hosting you again in the future. If theres anything else youd like to share or if there are any special requests for your next visit, please dont hesitate to reach out. Warmest regards, Kendrick P. Front Office Manager

reviews.review_text: Our flight had been cancelled unexpectedly and we picked up the  black phone  and were able to make a booking for this location right away. We didn t wait long and took the shuttle. The shuttle to and from the airport was free. Staff were amazing at understanding our circumstances and making us feel at home. It s a few mins from the airport and the rooms are spacious and clean. They even mailed my son s earphones that he had left behind to us! Thank you for your great service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good Day! Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear that your stay with us was nothing but wonderful. We look forward to seeing you again in your next visit to Vancouver. Thank you! Ken P.

reviews.review_text: Stay here if rooms are a priority. Really quality airport hotel with nice rooms that have all needed amenities. Everything was clean, Keurig in the room was nice, and staff were generally friendly. Shuttle to the airport is standard and appreciated. The location doesnt provide much in terms of food options. Restaurant in the hotel is okay (no free breakfast), and theres a McDonalds across the street. Nothing else seemed worth travelling to.
Perfect hotel! We have stayed here for two weeks after arriving to Vancouver, I can recommend to everyone. Staff is very nice. Rooms clean and big enough to comfortably live there.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good Day! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your review! Were thrilled to hear that you had a perfect stay with us at our hotel in Vancouver. Its wonderful to know that you found our staff to be very nice and that you were satisfied with the cleanliness and size of the rooms. We strive to provide a comfortable and enjoyable experience for all our guests, and its fantastic to hear that we met your expectations. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future. If theres anything else we can do to enhance your next stay, please dont hesitate to let us know. Sincerely, Kendrick P. Front Office Manager

reviews.review_text: Stopped by here for a few days after a cruise before airport. Great stay. Modern amenities in the room. Free airport shuttle! Fogg n suds attached to hotel was good, not great. Server was amazing, Guiness on tap was nice! McDonalds across the parking lot less expensive/convenient option than the breakfast buffet at $18/person. Would recommend and would definitely stay here again. Rooms: very modern, reading lights on the beds, background lighting behind the headboards, soft & firm labeled pillows. pillow top mattress were all very comfortable. Large TV in the room. plenty of lighting and counter space. Fridge/microwave. Bathrooms were excellent. Dove soap is very luxorious. Shower has good pressure. Food & drinks: attached bar/grill is decent, although not great. What is great is the server we had. Friendly and helpful.

Always reliable and comfortable stay at Holiday Inns.  This was no exception for me and my two boys.  Needed to hang out hats before flight the next day. The parking lot is covered and gated. Rooms: Spacious and well equipped.  Clean.

It was a pleasure staying at this hotel.  The staff were very accommodating, and the restaurant food was suburb.  We needed a late check out, and it was granted.  We needed a shuttle to and from hotel and that was not a problem. In fact, the shuttle was delayed leaving the hotel to go to the airport, so we were ordered a taxi by the staff, and we didnt have to wait.  The taxi was paid for by the hotel.  I recommend anyone wanting a clean, comfortable room with staff that pay attention to detail, stay here. Thank you for an enjoyable, restful stay at your beautiful hotel.

The rooms were clean and quite spacious. The staff were always hilarious and kind, as well as accommodating to our requests. The pub thats in the hotel is also excellent for food and service. The breakfast buffet served there was also so good! Ive never been at a hotel where they had more than cereal and muffins - it was a nice treat to have a hot breakfast available. Thank you for the wonderful stay and will definitely be back in the future!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good day Cassandra Finch, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us the wonderful feedback! We hope to see you again soon! Ralph

reviews.review_text: Wonderful service at check in, so helpful with upgrade and later check out, as we had 11pm flight. Room was exceptionally clean with everything we needed Restaurant, perfect for all our needs.  Great perfectly cooked dinner and lovely breakfast. Staff excellent in all areas.

One more night here then going to find a better hotel came here on emergencies situation no help from this hotel in the room you get only three pods of coffee two towels when we first arrived we went back down and told them the room wasn t vacuumed and three days here still stuff under the one chair
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Connie, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel. We deeply apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your time here. We genuinely value your input as it helps us identify areas for improvement. Were truly sorry that your emergency situation was met with less than satisfactory service. Our primary goal is to provide a comfortable and hassle-free experience for all our guests, and its clear we fell short in meeting your expectations. Rest assured, we take your concerns seriously and will address them promptly. Were disappointed to hear about the issues you faced in your room. The oversight in cleanliness are certainly not reflective of the standards we strive to maintain. We understand the importance of a clean room, and we apologize for failing to deliver on this aspect. We have shared your comments with our housekeeping team to ensure that proper attention is given to room cleanliness and amenities in the future. Your feedback will be used as a training tool to prevent similar occurrences in the future. If theres anything else youd like to share or if theres any way we can make amends for your experience, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly at +1 604-821-1818 or email at service@hiyvr.com. We genuinely hope you reconsider and give us another chance to provide you with a better stay in the future. Thank you for bringing these issues to our attention. We are committed to making the necessary improvements to ensure a more pleasant stay for all our guests. Sincerely, Kendrick P.

reviews.review_text: Shuttles arrived on time from and to the airport. The room was cleaner than some of the luxury hotels. Realized that I forgot something at the room when I arrived at the airport, called the hotel right away. They mailed it to my Alberta address as promised. Much appreciated!!

Great place to stay with the Fogg n Suds downstairs. The staff is awesome. There is free EV charging available. The best part is theyre pet friendly. We had two puppies we brought with us and were very well behaved. Thank you Holiday Inn for being pet friendly.
Staff were extremely pleasant. The room was most comfortable and the in-room coffee was delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Chris Carrier, We would like to take a moment to thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport - Richmond for your recent stay. It was a pleasure to have you as one of our valued guests. We would like to sincerely thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay and for taking the time to provide us with such positive feedback. We are thrilled to hear from your experience with us was a pleasant one, and we are especially pleased to hear that our staff was helpful and that your room met your expectations of cleanliness. Sincerely, Ralph Co Guest Services Manager 604-207-3183 service@hiyvr.com

reviews.review_text: Easy access to and from the airport. Clean rooms and friendly staff
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Mr. Risso, Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport-Richmond for your recent stay. Were thrilled to hear you enjoyed your time with us and appreciate your kind words. Your feedback is invaluable to us. It inspires our team to maintain our commitment to top-notch service and guest satisfaction. If you have any suggestions or concerns, please feel free to share. We hope to welcome you back soon and remain your preferred choice in Vancouver. Warm regards, Kendrick P. Front Office Manager 10720 Cambie Rd., Richmond BC, V6X 1K8 Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport-Richmond

reviews.review_text: One of the more comfortable holiday inns I ve stayed at. Unfortunately I had an early flight. Great friendly staff as I said nice room and cozy. I had one hiccup which wasn t the hotels fault and Ralph and his team sprung into action to resolve it right away. Great experience all in all. I ll be back.
Visit twice a month with work, Happy friendly staff, rooms always clean and tidy - always a great stay!

Stayed here for one night before flying out the next morning. Its close to the airport, so thats a bonus. The room I stayed in was clean and comfortable. The bed had a good blanket, so I wasnt too hot or cold. The bathroom was good. Toilet flushed with no issues. Shower drain did not back up and leave a pool of water at my feet. I had to leave before breakfast, so I cant comment on that. I did have dinner at the in-house restaurant the night I stayed. It was decent enough. I had the chicken wings and the hazy IPA beer. The beer was excellent. The wings were average, but still good. The restaurant has kind of a cafeteria feel to it, which is kinda meh, but it was still good.

My parents stay here regularly. Everyone here is amazing. Especially Michelle. She is always so happy and goes beyond and above just the front desk position. She is always making sure my parents are okay, greets all us children and grand children with so much positivity. She s always ready to help. She researched hotels for me in a different province due to an emergency and is on hand to help me book once I have to go. She is excellent at her job and always makes us feel welcomed. She deserves to be recognized for her outstanding customer service and support.

I had a pleasant stay here recently. The rooms are clean and well maintained. The staff were were courteous and helped out with late check in and check out as well. Breakfast was good too. Over all a great experience.

I was pleasantly surprised and how nice this hotel is. The lobby staff are pleasant and check in was a breeze. I do have one small disappointment in that I called in to the morning to request a room that didnt face the highway and they could not make that happen. I will say that the view though was fairly decent. The noise wasnt that bad from the cars below. The room itself was clean and large. Two queen beds and still plenty of room to not feel crowded. The beds were comfortable and provided a nice place to watch tv on. The television was large and its a smart tv so you can screen mirror although I used a Roku. This hotel would be perfect if it had a pool. But still a decent place to stay if you are not caring about amenities.

I got stranded due to Westjet cancelling my flight and not be able to fly me out for three days. Westjet wasn t able to get me a hotel so I was left on my own to find a place. Luckily this hotel had a few rooms left. The hotel and rooms are nice. There is a bar attached to the hotel too. I want to give a big shout out to Cam who works the front desk. He was amazing in helping me navigate Richmond and gave me a map of the local area and which bus to take. If you are in Richmond for sure consider staying here.

We stayed for five nights at this wonderful place. The staff was amazing and it was clean. One staff which stood out for us was Aloka. She was amazing. We were out for most of the day so we only ran into her in the evening. We talked to her on two different occasions and both times she gave us great recommendations. We are super happy with her recommendations since it worked well with our short stay in Richmond. Cannot wait to go back and we would definitely recommend staying here. Also, they have parking if you need it and a shuttle to the airport!!!

We had a wonderful stay here. Excellent central location, close to Granville Island + the airport + 30 min drive from suspension bridges. Service was too notch. Fast and friendly. Private safe gated parking. Delightful complimentary bath and body works shampoo + lotion + conditioner. Private dining hall for all 3 meals. Beds were so comfy. Design of hotel room was modern/new/clean. We had a wonderful stay, couldn t ask for more. Great prices too!!!

SUPER IMPRESSED!! My partner and I stayed at this particular Holiday Inn last night and into today and we were treated so well by the staff! So friendly and caring as soon as we walked through the door! We had a rough night at the ferry terminal, had to tow our car and were low on money. We didnt have a reservation but they could see we had a bad night so they took us in right away, gave us a complimentary drink and a deal for the room. They even let us check out at a later time so we didnt have to wait 2 hrs at the car dealership to get our vehicle back. THIS IS HOW CUSTOMER SERVICE SHOULD BE! Thank you so much for your kindness and hospitality! :)

We recently stayed here twice as we flew in and out of Vancouver on the way to our success trip.  Rooms were clean, front desk staff were polite and helpful.  Theres a free round-trip shuttle to the airport.  Plus when I called ahead for shuttle pick up they had my check info ready when I arrived. Shout out to the staff member that helped me book my rooms on the phone! They were patient and helpful and ensured we had the best deal available.

Nice clean location, the airport shuttle was on time and efficient even with a 4am trip to the airport. The view is skyline is outstanding from the rooms on a clear day, restaurant on site is great with friend staff and good pub food. Check Inn was what was expected from all amazing IHG hotels. I try to stay here every trip to Vancouver for both person and business.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Terry Regner, Thanks for sharing your experience with us and your loyalty to the brand! Were glad to learn that your experience with us remains positive and we hope to continue this trend through these challenging times Safe Travels, Ralph

reviews.review_text: Cam at the front desk is amazing, so friendly and accommodating. The hotel is in great shape, clean as a whistle, great modern decor and the beds are super comfy. The airport shuttle is great and the driver was also very friendly and funny.  Highly recommended!

Super clean and modern room. Very comfortable bed, with four massive pillows - 2 soft and 2 firm. Lots of plugs and USB ports for charging in the room. Staff was very nice assisting us with our bags. Nice and close to McDonalds, when you are craving a fast food meal after a week of dining out.  Good secure parking.

I feel the need to let anyone know whos uncertain about the quality of a lower-mid-range hotel, that this is one of the comfiest sleeps Ive ever had. I booked last minute after my flight was delayed and for a 3 star hotel, I have to say, the mattress and pillows were some of the softest, squishiest, and comfiest Ive experienced. It was the best thing to happen to me after a long day of travel. If all Holiday Inns are like this, I am probably going to continue to choose these over 5 star hotels based on the beds alone.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us the great feedback! Were glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, we look forward to welcoming you back. Safe Travels, Ralph

reviews.review_text: It is a comfortable hotel. Clean room and nice employee. The location is convenient. Restaurants are not far from here. The only thing that could be improved is the internet speed. Sending email with a medium size photo would took 5 minutes to upload. It you dont worry about Internet, this is a perfect hotel. It is also near the Vancouver international Airport.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us the great feedback! Were glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, we look forward to welcoming you back. Safe Travels, Ralph

reviews.review_text: was having a bad travel day and this hotel and its staff turned it around. The staff was very nice and helpful.  the rooms were clean, quiet,  everything working as expected and the beds.  The beds and pillows felt like clouds hugging you. The location is also pretty good. fairly easy and straight forward to get to the city. one day when this pandemic is over, I will come back to visit Vancouver in all its glory and stay in this hotel again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Arthur Leung, We appreciate the feedback and are very happy to hear that we turned your day around and look forward to having you back! Safe Travels, Ralph

reviews.review_text: Excellent hotel with views of the mountains and Vancouver skyline from the upper floors! Nice clean rooms with lots of plugs and comfy beds. Large tv s in the room and nice furniture as well! Staff were very helpful and super nice! Shuttle to the airport is one of the reasons we picked this one!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us the great feedback! Were glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, we look forward to welcoming you back. Safe Travels, Ralph

reviews.review_text: Cam at the Holiday Inn Cambie Road location has been absolutely brilliant. His level of patience and professionalism is outstanding. It is the people interaction and the level of care demonstrated that makes the stay worthwhile. Highly recommended.
The rooms are lovely. The location is ideal for an early trip to the airport and I booked my shuttle upon arrival. Alex and Ian helped me check in and they were so fun and helpful. Great staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us the great feedback! Were glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, we look forward to welcoming you back. Safe Travels, Ralph

reviews.review_text: Great location to the airport and free parking for IHG members, was a big plus.  Very friendly staff let us have an early check-in after a long flight from Australia and that made us feel like humans again. Lovely view from the room of the Vancouver mountains. Rooms

Ive been here at this hotel twice, and both times the rooms were very clean. The parking lot upstairs for guests is pretty small for how many rooms they have. Sometimes they charge $8 for parking, but Im not sure about the conditions since I was only charged once. They also offer free shuttles to the airport, but there are no Bell boys to help carry your items. Everything is very much self serve.

Nice, clean and very convenient. Very happy with stay here,  Mcdonalds is right on same compound and is open late, which comes in very handy if you are in a hurry. Great staff, cant say anything more. Thank you

have been living here for at least 3 times and they recently renovated the rooms I guess. Its clean and quiet and the restaurant down there has good tap beer as well. the only complaint is the parking lot is a little too small for van. still good tho.

It was supposed to be a quick overnight stay to continue my long journey but it turned out to be a refreshing and relaxing stop! They are aware of the little details people like, like a white noise machine (!), coconut lime bath and body works shampoo,  conditioner and lotion (omg yes), different types of pillow each with an embroidery label of its features (soft, etc), comfey bed and bedding, spacious and collapsible modular desk/workstation area. The front desk was also responsive and helpful. Ill definately stay again... This is a very well managed Hotel!

Brand new rooms! Comfy beds, new TV, fridge, microwave and a Keurig.   Bathroom is also new and clean.  Service was very good. Update: Sept 17, 2018: I accidentally booked a different Holiday Inn, which is much further from my remote office.  I walked in, asked if they could transfer my reservation and Alessandra was super helpful.  She found me a room and moved my reservation for me, even honored my original price (prices had gone up). GREAT Service... super helpful!! :-)

Newly renovated rooms, much improved from before. Better lighting, new bed, very large smart tv, usb plugs to charge; everything is modern. Hotel is attached to a restaurant that does a good breakfast buffet, typical options. Hotel staff were friendly and have a good sense of humor. Airport shuttle runs every 30 minutes. My only suggestion would be to post the airport pickup times on their site, but that is the only thing An excellent stay. Thanks.

I ve stayed at this Holiday Inn on a few occasions now and it s always on point. The rooms are always clean, they come with a fridge, a microwave, and they even have room service; which is rare for most 3 star rated hotels. The staff is very friendly and attentive, they always grant me a late checkout if needed free of charge. Plus they just renovated the hotel in 2018 so it s all modernized. If you couldn t tell already I definitely recommend it.

Great stay overall. Staff was friendly and efficient. Experienced no issues. Free WiFi is fast, but parking and breakfast are additional costs unlike most other holiday inns Ive stayed at. Overall this hotel is modern, pretty good value, and recommended.

Loved this hotel!! So many wonderful touches that I appreciated....like the sound machine, the modern lighting, the ability to plug your computer into the TV, the amenities in the shower that were from one of my favorite toxic-free brands, the fridge and microwave. Plus a super comfy bed and very nice staff!

I was a bit nervous about staying in a place so close to the highway, but the rooms are stunning and the noise is very minimal. Its fun to watch the planes go by and the blackout shades are super nice. The airconditioning is also a nice touch.

Booking was easy and affordable thru a third-party party website and it only took a few minutes to update in the hotel registry. I was able to pay for the room online with my visa debit and only had to put 100 security deposit.

This was an amazing hotel.  I highly recommend to stay here if you have a connection.  It is about 5 minutes from airport and 15 minutes ride in taxi to downtown Vancouver. The hotel rooms are large and very clean. The bed is large and comfortable.  Ralph was fantastic for check in and called me a taxi and was very easy on the eyes

Great hotel near to the Vancouver airport. Have yet to meet someone at the front desk I wouldnt want to be friends with yet as they are all friendly, humourous, and welcoming. Rooms are clean, smell nice, and have nice soft sheets. Top with the free shuttle to the airport and youll definitely see me here before all my 6am flights.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Mirana Halladay, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us feedback. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our shuttle for the airport could get you there on time. We hope to see you again, Ralph

reviews.review_text: Very friendly staff. Not many guests at the moment so plenty of space to spread out. Clean with sanitizer stations all around. They were able to accommodate a 10am check in so I was able to leave my things in my room. Ordered room service and the food was from Fogg and Sudds - love the dry ribs and baked macaroni and cheese! Overall great experience
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Shervy Mandap, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this wonderful feedback. We are very glad to hear that we could accommodate an early check-in for you all the while making you feel welcomed. We hope to see you again soon! Safe Travels, Ralph

reviews.review_text: Rooms are renovated, good airport hotel at descent price. There is a mcnasty in the parking lot of you have a craving. However mcnasty after 22;00...you need to go to mcdrive

Pretty decent lobby. I liked the way it is connected to a bar/restaurant but sadly closes early. Shuttle is very conveniently schedule that runs every 15 minutes.during the rush hours. A nice-to-stay hotel for a seemingly average price within the area.

Stayed here twice during our stay in Vancouver on recommendation of a good friend. Pure bliss. The room was immaculate and bed was amazingly comfortable. I wish I have one at home too.   The staff are friendly, polite and accommodating. Location wise, its close to the airport with service shuttle. Parks, restaurants, shops and McArthur Glen Outlet are just pretty close too. This place is  highly recommended!

My favourite inexpensive hotel ever!  Ive stayed here many, many times over the last 10 years and never had a bad stay.  The desk staff is friendly, theres a Fog & Suds restaurant on premises.  The freeway to Vancouver or the Border is just around the corner. The rooms and public areas are always clean and comfortable.  The housekeeping staff always calls if we forget an item. I prefer this Holiday Inn over the other location in Richmond because the other site gets a lot of international travelers and many rooms or public areas smell of smoke.  The parking isnt nearly as good either.

The rooms are really nice. The big plus side is, given its extremely close proximity to Vancouver International Airport (YVR), you cant even hear the air traffic that literally flies directly over the hotel. The beds, oh my God the beds, are TO die for. Super plush mattress pad and quality duvets/comforters, mixed with exceptional bedding and linens, and not to mention the 4 extra long, extra plush/firm pillows (2, soft + 2 semi firm for each bed) ...  It makes it such a relaxing day after a long haul flight.

They have shuttles bus from airport which is nice, also help you out for lift up luggage. The counter staff is very nice n friendly. The room is in standard n clean, very worth for the price. We also had dinner in restaurant next door out the hotel, very tasty. T
Rooms are nice and modern.  Clean and comfortable.  Low noise even though it is close to an airport.  Staff was very friendly

Not only did we get a fantastic rate on this place, the rooms are wonderfully up to date and th beds are incredibly comfotable.  Wally at the front desk was super to deal with, very welcoming and funny.  Would absolutely recommend this place to anyone looking for a quiet, clean and upscale place to stay near the airport.

Very pleasant experience. Close to Vancouver Airport, complimentary Airport shuttle, very helpful and polite front desk, free and fast wifi service and fogs and suds reataurant right inside the hotel is a win win. Throughly enjoyed my stay. I will come again. Highly recommended Hotel in Richmond.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good day Ricky Ricky, Thank you so much for the great rating! Hope to see you again soon! Ralph

reviews.review_text: Great location. Close enough to the airport and had a convenient airport shuttle. The parking garage is secure and has spots for charging electric cars.

Quick and friendly check-in, great rates, and clean comfortable rooms. I appreciate when hotel staff are themselves and dont feel like theyre reading from a script. You cant go wrong when looking for a nice quiet airport hotel
Hotel staff were very friendly and professional.  The room was very clean, up-to-date and quiet.  The airport shuttle ran on-time exactly as promised.  I would stay here again!

I love this airport. Its styling is awesome and not barbaric like most airports. Open, well lit and very quiet because of the carpet throughout. Plenty of stores and restaurants to pass time waiting for your bird. Customs has always been the friendliest of any Canadian city and that has not changed over the years.
Fabulous stay, both times. Rooms are clean and accessories in them are helpful. Staff is friendly snd knowledgeable. Will use this as my airport hotel from now on.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good Day Yvonne Jones, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this wonderful review! Our team will be happy to hear about the great stay that you had and look forward to seeing you again! Safe Travels, Ralph

reviews.review_text: Convenient hotel for airport with one of the most comfortable beds i have ever slept in. Good restaurant too

We stayed here for 2 days and nights. Steven and Ralf that work at the front desk were great. They set up the city tour and explained  how to get back to the hotel. They have great beds and the hotel is on top of their game. Clean and friendly. Will stay here next time we are in town.

Great hotel!! I travel to Vancouver at least 3 times a year and have stayed at a variety of airport hotels but this will now be my go to. Clean modern with super comfortable beds and great location close to the airport and different places in Richmond

Amazing stay. The gentleman at the front desk was soooooo incredibly helpful and accommodating, setting up cab rides, wake up calls, and shuttle rides for myself and my infant daughter when we recently stayed to have her congenital heart condition followed-up at BC Childrens Hospital. He was cheery and friendly and answered all of our questions, as well as informing us about all the Covid policies we needed to know about. The room was exceptionally clean and comfortable and even though Ive been sleep-deprived with a newborn, super grouchy from postpartum hormones, and stressed to the max dealing with a baby with severe previously-unknown health complications after birth (literally every reason to be in a bad mood with a short fuse right now...) it felt like a mini vacation! We will be visiting Vancouver frequently over the next year and we absolutely will NOT hesitate to stay here again. Thank you for going the extra mile, having exceptional customer service and cleanliness, and being a small ray of sunshine and comfort in an otherwise stressful and horrible situation. We appreciate it so much.

Enjoyed a solid nights sleep in a cozy bed that had perfect pillows (neither too hard not too soft). Room felt nice & homey and included a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, TV, safe, desk, ironing board, hair dryer, etc... They had free shuttle service (which stops at all 3 nearby Holiday Inn from the airport locations), with the last run leaving YVR at midnight.
I would like to acknowledge Michelle in reservations for her outstanding help with my issues Rooms: Very nice
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good day Dave Kubota, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a feedback and we hope to continue this process helping our loyal customers. Thank you, Ralph

reviews.review_text: Rooms were clean and comfortable. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Love the shuttle service, was able to get around without a car no problem.

Clean, neat and great location. Enjoyed my stay December 6 to the 9th. I appreciate the staff. The chambermaids where very helpful and in particular Cam at the front desk. This is the fourth time I ve stayed here and won t be the last time. Phil Johnston Kelowna B.C.

Lovely hotel for an overnight or longer stay. Helpful staff, nice rooms and extremely comfy beds and pillows. Very good buffet breakfast included in price. Would recommend....pillows so nice I bought one to take back to UK

Amazing staff and place to stay. I was here for a week while waiting on repairs for my truck and had plenty of interactions with the front desk employees, the cleaning staff, and the restaurant attached. If I could give more stars I would. Thanks for making my downtime a good experience.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Abel Aklilu, We appreciate you taking the time leaving us feedback regarding your stay. We are glad that you had a positive experience with us during your stay and that we were able to make your downtime in Vancouver memorable. We hope to see you again, Ralph

reviews.review_text: Holiday Inn always once again delivers a consistent experience. Room is nice and clean. Staff is friendly. They even upgraded my room, provided that I was an IHG Gold Elite member. Overall a very good and consistent experience.

The room was clean and comfortable. Staff was very helpful, polite and extremely fast. At our event we decided to eat at the attached restaurant which was excellent and fair priced. I would recommend staying here to anyone.

The hotel is located near to my office so it was very convenient. There is a bus stop right infront so you could take the bus to the skyway station to go to downtown. The staff is friendly, room is clean. You have free wifi in rooms, coffee machine, fridge and microwave. The rooms are quite as long as you get one away from the road. Im a light sleeper however had no problems. Eventually I would definitely come back to this hotel.
Clean and nicely newly renovated rooms. Location is amazing as all major food places are near. McDonald s is literally in the same parking lot and downtown is easily accessible
Nice room and comfy bed. Seems pricey but no worse than any other hotel in the area. Restaurant is nice which is a good thing since there is nothing nearby... maybe four or five blocks.
Great location easy drive to the airport.  Staff is friendly and room was great.  Restaurant adjacent to hotel food was yummy and priced reasonable.
We had a fantastic stay. Lovely hotel.  Very comfortable bed.  Great staff.  Good amenities.  Spacious room.  Awesome service.  Highly recommend
Very clean. Polite and professional staff at hotel and in the excellent adjoining restaurant, Fogg & Suds.
They have Keurig machines and pods for the rooms. The TV was modern high def so it was very convenient to plug into my laptop. The provided soaps were actually decent.

Great staff, nice on-site restaurant, and a great shuttle service make this a go-to spot prior to flying out of Vancouver International.  The facility upgrades were done in all the right places, so guests can relax.
Love this holiday Inn. Its my go to when Im in Richmond for work! Rooms are great and the staff are awesome.
Nice, clean hotel. Parking garage is really nice, will all the rain in the area. Front desk and staff are great. Restaurant has great selection and friendly staff.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Nicholas Hoffman, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this great review. We take great pride in providing clean and consistent service with our service team. We hope to see you soon again, Safe Travels, Ralph

reviews.review_text: Excellent service and extremely clean and safe especially during a pandemic that we are in. Hotel staff showed to really be going the extra mile with safety and social distancing and our hotel stay was one of the best we have had in a long time,
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jonathan Nelson, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this wonderful review! We are very happy to hear that you felt safe and comfortable at our facilities where weve taken the appropriate measures to ensure guest safety during these concerning times. We hope to see you again soon! Safe Travels, Ralph

reviews.review_text: Friendliest staff I ve ever seen, been really helpful. They also have shuttle bus to the airport. Room was clean and tidy. It s also very close to the airport.
Staff really helped me in a jam when Air Canada screwed things up. Very comfortable, clean and great service. Food & drinks: Foggnsuds on site. McDonalds next door
Lots of parking, very modern clean rooms, friendly courteous service and the restaurant was way better than expected.
The price was right and the staff are incredibly polite and helpful. I would definitely stay here again. The breakfast buffet could have used some more options but was good.
Always a pleasure staying at this holiday inn
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Mr. Asim, Good Day! Thank you so much for your wonderful review and for giving us a perfect rating! We are thrilled to hear about your positive experience at our hotel, and we genuinely appreciate your kind words. Its always our top priority to ensure our guests have a memorable and comfortable stay, and were delighted to know that we were able to meet your expectations. If theres anything specific that you particularly enjoyed during your stay or if you have any suggestions for how we can further enhance our services, please feel free to share. Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our hotel in the future. If you have any future travel plans or if theres anything we can assist you with, please dont hesitate to reach out. Were here to make your next visit even more exceptional! Once again, thank you for choosing our hotel and for your fantastic review. We look forward to serving you again in the near future. - Kevin

reviews.review_text: Only stayed for 8 hours but it was clean and friendly staff. Comfortable beds but the pillows gave me a stiff neck. Im pretty sensitive with that sort of stuff though.
Just checked out. Front desk Cam always makes sure every guest would get the best experiences of the stay. Room is very clean. I would definitely go back again.

Really enjoyed our stay here the front desk check in was very professional and fast the rooms were very clean and also newly renovated and we ordered room service and the food was delicious I definitely will stay here again!
Very seamless check in and check out. The staff were friendly and helpful, and the room was clean and spacious.
Great experience. Room was huge and super clean. Desk staff were extremely helpful and friendly. Definitely will be back next time were in Richmond!
Excellent check in, very nice hotel and amenities. Super staff. Very impressed. Definitely my go to hotel next time Im in the area.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Shelly Bottrell, We appreciate your wonderful review of your stay. We hope to see you soon again! Safe Travels, Ralph
